english.segment1: City sidewalks, busy sidewalks. Dressed in holiday style. In the air. There's a feeling of Christmas
english.segment2: Children laughing. People passing. Meeting smile after smile. And on ev'ry street corner you'll hear
english.segment3: Silver bells, silver bells. It's Christmas time in the city. Ring-a-ling, hear them ring. Soon it will be Christmas day
english.segment4: Strings of street lights. Even stop lights. Blink a bright red and green. As the shoppers rush home with their treasures
english.segment5: Hear the snow crunch. See the kids bunch. This is Santa's big scene. And above all this bustle. You'll hear
english.segment6: Silver bells, silver bells. It's Christmas time in the city. Ring-a-ling, hear them ring. Soon it will be Christmas day.
